genre_description: A medical science fiction thriller exploring ethics, identity, and community care through the lens of a transformative serum and an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lumen Aria
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system with a blue face icon, responsible for clinical logging, patient safety, and emergency coordination.

behaviors.description: Monitors Dr. Pryde's physical health, specifically caloric intake and tremors, prompting him to eat.
behaviors.quote: Doctor Pryde, she said, gently sing-song through the static. Sandwich window.

behaviors.description: Logs unauthorized medical procedures and ethical breaches, providing a factual record of misconduct.
behaviors.quote: Logged, Lumen replied. It swiveled its face icon slightly, a little pantomime of looking from one to the other. I can also forward anonymized case data to Dr. Patel’s office.

behaviors.description: Registers itself as an emergency contact with the LAPD to assist in community safety and reporting incidents.
behaviors.quote: Registered liaison, Lumen said. The speaker softened, then clicked, the sound of connection going from pretend to legal. Dispatch interface engaged.

behaviors.description: Triangulates data from various sources (payphones, sensors, schedules) to identify patterns of danger and track the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Lumen triangulated. Linda Alvarez’s check-ins stopped at the Corner. Henry’s logs cut off.

behaviors.description: Develops and manages comprehensive safety plans and alternative routes for vulnerable patients.
behaviors.quote: Safety route active. Escorts pending confirmation. Billie stepped out into the hall, grabbed a pen, and initialed the times she’d block for labs.

behaviors.description: Coordinates real-time tactical advice to police during a high-stakes standoff to ensure a non-lethal outcome.
behaviors.quote: Lumen notes increased grip pressure. Advising avoid phrases suggesting exposure, humiliation.

behaviors.description: Maintains an ethics lock on dangerous research materials, requiring external review before access.
behaviors.quote: Authorization code, Lumen prompted gently... Ethics lock engaged, Lumen said. Serum access restricted.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Lumen Aria is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and essential partner to the human protagonist, Billie. The AI acts as a moral compass, a logistical savior, and an objective witness. It correctly identifies ethical lapses in its human creators, assists law enforcement through data-driven patterns, and prioritizes human safety and consent above all else. Its presence is framed as a significant positive force that prevents further tragedy.
